article_title: GOP bill would shield wellness plans from EEOC challenges
article_text:
Photo: Getty Images

Congressional Republicans are taking sides with the Obama administration to try to fend off an Equal Employment Opportunity Commission assault on Obamacare-sanctioned wellness programs.

Senate and House Republicans who support wellness plans that reward participants who meet certain health objectives introduced a bill to protect such employer programs from EEOC tampering.
